snippet: “A Gentleman’s Guide to Love & Murder,” which just received 10 Tony nominations, is on Broadway; a rooftop exhibition at the Met is open; and celebrities are sharing their cheating stories.
abstract: “A Gentleman’s Guide to Love & Murder,” which just received 10 Tony nominations, is on Broadway; a rooftop exhibition at the Met is open; and celebrities are sharing their cheating stories.

byline.original: By SOFIA PERPETUA and CHRISTIAN ROMAN

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
